description: 无论你是想模仿草薙京的赤炎拳、乌拉拉的火焰咒、伏地魔的incendio，这个安全又小巧的腕带火焰喷射器都会让你在朋友面前大出风头...
content: Launch face-melting bursts of flames that’ll leave your audience in awe using this open hand fireball launcher. Made with discretion in mind, the compact size makes it easy to conceal and it can also shoot up to two fire balls simultaneously.

description: Sphero出品，星战迷必备。追求情怀之余可以下载配套教育app和孩子一起完成一系列有趣的STEM课程，更别提还可以通过全息仿真给孩子介绍曾让你痴迷的那个a galaxy far far away...
content: When boredom strikes, the Sphero remote control R2-D2 is definitely the droid that you want by your side. It features holographic simulation, authentic movements, and can interact with other Star Wars app-enabled drones.

This modern three person hammock is the ideal place to partake in a lively conversation with friends while enjoying the great outdoors. It features a weather resistant metallic frame and three high quality hammocks designed for maximum comfort.

description: 最高亮度1000流明、可给手机GoPro及任何USB设备充电、内置SOS求救信号、挂帐篷内悬背包后安车把上、防水防摔72小时续航的Lantern Lights多功能手电筒，绝对是居家旅行户外运动的不二之选
content: No matter what type of lighting device the situation calls for this multifunctional flash light is the right tool for the job. This versatile gadget not only functions as a flash light and lantern but can also be used as an SOS strobe and as a charger that will keep your devices juiced up.

description: 咖啡是一种宗教。如果你恰好有位信教的朋友，不管是什么教派 - Starbucks or Philz，Fair trade or Home made，蓝山或摩卡，炭烧或爱尔兰，这本书都会是最棒的礼物
content: Learn about the long and fascinating journey your prized roasts take before they make it to your mug by reading The World Atlas of Coffee. You’ll learn about every aspect of this incredible plant – from its origins and history, to the cultivation process and beyond.

titleEN: Porn For Women Of A Certain Age
description: 不出所料，这本充满了揶揄和幽默的小册子，颇合那些风韵不减的知性熟女胃口，是年轻女性送给姐姐或阿姨的绝佳礼物；对于男性来说，如果想约一位让你怦然心动的知性熟女，熟读这本书会让你马到成功~
content: Add some sizzle to your golden years by going through the sultry pages of Porn for Women of a Certain Age. This tantalizing read depicts forty hot and steamy scenarios that show handsome hotties catering to your every whim.

titleCN: 火箭联盟(Rocket League)竞技游戏箱
description: Hot Wheels出品的这款游戏箱让所有“火箭联盟”(Rocket Leauge)的粉丝们可以在现实中复刻电脑游戏中那些激动人心的场景 - 还犹豫什么，摆好赛车，打开红外，联上蓝牙，开始新一轮的角逐吧！
content: Experience all the thrilling action of a Rocket League game in real life by going head-to-head with your buddy using this Stadium playset from Hot Wheels. The set includes everything you’ll need to bring this exciting and fast-paced game to life.

description: 没有不爱吃饭的狗狗，只有不会撒狗粮的主人！“超级美味狗粮调味料”使用100%纯天然有机原料制成，营养丰富口味诱人，并可以根据爱犬的偏好选择培根、烧烤、花生酱、火鸡、披萨等诸多口味...
content: Throw your canine companion a bone come mealtime by drastically improving the flavor of their food with this gourmet dog food seasoning. It’s made using local and organic ingredients and available in savory flavors like “barkin’ bbq”, “bae’con and eggs”, and “pizza”.

description: 屠龙英雄手中的剑，决斗骑士手中的矛，西部片里拔枪的牛仔，保龄球馆中持球的你。不要像谢耳朵一样在保龄球场上犯妇人之仁的错误，拿着这枚哥特风格的保龄球，让你的对手和球瓶一起颤抖吧...
content: Crush your enemies and hear the lamentation of their women at the local bowling alley while using this intimidating skull bowling ball. With a frightening design, bowling pins will instantly knock over in mortal fear before you even launch the ball down the lane.

titleEN: The Skeptics’ Guide To The Universe
description: 卡尔.萨根《魔鬼出没的世界》(The Demon Haunted World)之后最好的介绍科学怀疑论与批判性思考的著作 - 如果你的朋友不知道卡尔.萨根是谁，请顺便送他/她斯皮尔伯格经典影片《接触》(Contact)的蓝光DVD
content: In a world increasingly filled with alternative facts, learn how to know what’s really real by reading The Skeptics’ Guide To The Universe. This all-encompassing guide to skeptical thinking will help you apply logic and reason to your everyday life.

Blow people’s minds away at the next Sunday BBQ when you hand them hamburger meat in a hot dog bun! The ham dogger is a meat mold that allows you to take beef and contour it into a traditional hot dog shape, giving a fun twist on burgers and hot dogs alike.

description: 我们的生命里总会有几个和我们相爱相杀让我们爱恨交加的敌人兼好友，在抓狂时如何保持冷静并优雅地表达你的不满？“非直接攻击便条”正是为此目的而生，让你既切中要害，又不计前嫌...
content: Express yourself without having to directly encounter another actual human being by leaving behind one of these passive aggressive notes. These effortlessly witty notes allow you to conveniently address a range of behavioral failures in others.

titleCN: 抽屉内置多功能充电器
description: 手机、iPad、笔记本、Kindle、Fitbit...太多需要充电的电子产品让屋子变得不够整洁？使用抽屉内置多功能充电器，轻松地将闲置的抽屉转变成一个隐秘的充电基地吧~
content: Instantly create a discreet charging station anywhere in your home using this in-drawer charging outlet. This easy-to-install outlet features a slim design that’ll fit most standard cabinet sizes so that you can charge up to four devices simultaneously.

description: 再浓郁的爱意也无法在彻夜不休的鼾声中长久，而”打鼾者胶带“致力于解决您的烦恼，无论昨夜如何风急雨骤，保证浓睡后海棠依旧，婴儿般的睡眠体验，每个人都值得拥有~
content: Everyone hates mouth-breathers! So give your partner instant relief from your incessant snoring with this mouth breather tape. It covers your mouth shut for better nose breathing, less mouth breathing, and instant snoring relief so you can both sleep like newborn babies.

Be prepared in case the unthinkable should occur by carrying this spiked self defense ring. The ring features an over-sized pointed tip that protrudes outward when you form a first, so that you can quickly defend yourself against your attacker.

description: 专为旅行而量身定做的极简主义钱包，真皮材质简约设计，不但能安全存放信用卡、现金、护照、登机牌等重要文件，内置RFID保护还可以保证任何电子盗窃都无从下手，信息安全不再有任何后顾之忧
content: Keep important documents safe and at hand while you trot the globe using this minimalist travel wallet. This genuine leather wallet is designed to securely carry everything from credit cards to boarding passes and passports while still maintaining a slim profile.

titleCN: 乐高版星战波尔格鸟套装
titleEN: Life Size LEGO Star Wars Porg Set
description: 无论《星战:最后的绝地武士》这部电影毁誉如何，其中呆萌的波尔格鸟绝对圈粉无数；用这套811片零件的星战系列套装，你可以打造一个属于自己的萌鸟波尔格~
content: Using this life size LEGO Star Wars themed set you’ll be able to construct your very own adorable little porg that you can interact with. Made from 811 pieces, this cute little fella stands over 7 inches tall and can move its mouth and flap its wings.

description: 将你价格不菲的大牌香水简单地喷洒在吊坠上，即可以让香味持续时间增长7倍以上，从而使你无时无刻都可以散发出令人倾倒的淡淡的幽香~
content: Get the most out of your fine and pricey fragrances by accenting your look with some fragrance infusible jewelry. The pendant can be infused with your favorite cologne or perfume in order to make it last approximately seven times longer.

titleEN: Sony V71 High Power Audio System
description: 索尼V71是毋庸置疑的party大杀器 - 现场音乐会的音效、360°夜店的灯光、电吉他+麦克风的口、炫酷的DJ打碟特效...记住，音浪太强不晃会被撞到地上！
content: The Sony V71 high power audio system will get the party started and keep it going all night long. This Bluetooth enabled device allows you to take full control of the party with a built-in mic input, cool DJ effects, and a 360° party light for an authentic nightclub experience.

description: Bob Ross，美国当代最负盛名的绘画大师和电视节目主持人，如果你对学习油画感兴趣，请去YouTube搜索”The Joy of Painting“，然后一边画油画一边吃吐司吧...
content: Give the most important meal of the day a fun and artsy twist with a few golden Bob Ross toasts. Instead of boring old plain toasts, you’ll be able to enjoy some happy little toasted bread slice that are complemented with a cool little portrait of the late artist.

After much speculation and rumors, the Beastie Boys Book has finally been released. Fans of the iconic and influential group can now sift through the almost 600 pages and learn how they went from an obscure band to a worldwide sensation and household name.

description: 不管你准备装饰美国万圣节还是墨西哥亡灵节，这款充满浓郁哥特风格的骷髅吊灯都绝对能让你客厅的恐怖指数直线飙升，你说这是从《盗墓笔记》片场拿回来的，我绝对相信~💀
content: Add a macabre twist to your humble abode by illuminating the room with this striking skeleton chandelier. Three skeleton torsos sit side by side as they hold candle shaped lights in each hand. It’s the perfect prop for your next Halloween party!

description: 一款非常适合陪着孩子们一边吃餐后点心一边玩儿的趣味游戏 - 当音乐响起时，食物会在皇冠周围盘旋飞舞，考验吃货本色的时候到了，看一看谁能最终尝到胜利的滋味~👑
content: What better way to entertain your foodie friends on game night than with the Chow Crown game? In this fun new game, players must try and eat as many of the dangling food items that are placed on the crown as they float just out of reach of their mouth.

description: 作为热衷户外运动的爱狗人士，这款专为狗狗设计的上车踏板可以保证你的爱犬能毫不费力地飞驰进你的越野车里，和你一起向新的冒险出发~
content: Make it easier for your large canine companion to hop aboard your car by outfitting your ride with this vehicle hitch step for dogs. This portable accessory fits both 1.25 inch and 2 inch hitch receivers and allows for 6 inches of height adjustment.

description: 使用三星SmartThings实时追踪设备，除了可以随时随地打开手机轻松定位任何其附着的物品，还可以预先设置安全区域，一旦物品离开则自动发送警告或位置信息
content: Find important items anytime and from anywhere with help from the SmartThings real time tracking device. Using the accompanying app you’ll easily be able to track this pint-sized device as long as it’s within range of a cellular network.

description: 想把你的楼梯打造成霍格沃茨图书馆的风格吗？尝试这款用环保防水PVC材料制成的可移除3D书架楼梯装饰贴纸，轻易给你的房间增添一丝情趣和书香~
content: Add personality to your home by transforming your plain staircase into an incredible vertical library with these DIY 3D bookshelf stair decals. They’re made from eco-friendly waterproof PVC that is easily removed – making them ideal for any home.

description: 任何星战迷都会对这个淌着口水像鼻涕虫一样缓慢移动的银河系黑社会大佬记忆深刻，这款咖啡杯能让你聊天时绝不冷场 - 你知道贾巴被莱娅公主勒死是卢卡斯向《教父》电影致敬吗？
content: Add a geeky spin to your daily coffee routine by pouring your piping hot brew inside this Jabba The Hut coffee mug. This out-of-this-world mug is microwave-safe and features an XL 26 ounce capacity, which makes it perfect for either beverages or soups.

titleCN: 蓝牙AI骨传导耳机太阳镜
titleEN: Bluetooth AI Bone Conduction Speaker Sunglasses
description: 这款太阳镜充满了007的风格：可接电话，能放音乐，还可以通过蓝牙与手机AI实时对话，更别提革命性的骨传导技术，即直接让声波通过震动传入头骨及至耳膜，彻底让耳机退出了历史舞台~
content: Wear your beats with these bone conduction speaker sunglasses. This revolutionary eyewear features bone conduction speakers that enables it to transmit sound waves directly to the skull via vibrations – eliminating the need for headphones.

description: 和演唱会那些业余水平的荧光棒不同，这款工业级荧光棒展示了专业的素养：耐操、防水、不燃烧、无危险化学成分、并且可以持续发亮12个小时，是户外运动或露营时不可或缺的极品装备~
content: If regular glow sticks just aren’t cutting it, these industrial grade light sticks are sure to get the job done. Unlike their party-friendly counterparts, these sturdy and waterproof sticks are designed to emit a bright green glow that will last for up to 12 hours.

description: 对吃货来说，烤火鸡或做培根剩下的那些油脂堪比液体黄金，怎么舍得轻易倒掉！这款不锈钢打造的油脂储存容器内置防黏着涂层，不但便于清洗，更能保证油脂始终保持初始状态，绝无变质之忧~
content: Don’t you dare throw out that delicious bacon grease! Collect that liquid gold using this bacon grease storage container! The container and strainer are made from wrought iron and given a non-stick coating that will prevent rusting and keep your grease in pristine.

description: 这款迷你机器人呆萌的表情包神似WALL-E，它听得懂语音指令能并智能互动，还可以帮你拍照并按要求发送到社交媒体，另外你还可以让它在家里自动巡航，然后视频传到云端服务器上~
content: Vector is the mini personal robot that’s smart, fun, and affordable. This little fella is always eager to assist you with anything ranging from accessing social media to playing fun games, and can also function as a patrolling security camera and much more!

description: 从NERF枪最基本的动力原理一直进阶到弹簧改造、电路焊接、定制喷漆、3D打印...NERF枪改装达人手把手演示如何将你收藏的孩之宝NERF枪从射程到射速从外观到内部一一完美升级
content: Gain an upper hand in battle by improving your existing NERF blaster with help from this great modification guide. The man behind the YouTube Channel “Out of Darts” will show you how to create a cooler looking blaster with improved firing capacity, range, and speed.

description: 飞船的橘色头灯烘托出宁静的氛围，淡蓝色的银河系在其尾部若隐若现呈现出宇宙的浩瀚，当夜幕降临时，这艘破壁而出的千年隼带给你的不仅仅是光亮，还有些许硬核科幻片的诡异既视感
content: Give your bedroom some out-of-this-world flair and ambient lighting with this Star Wars Millennium Falcon 3D light. The energy safe LEDs create an inviting glow while the design and accompanying wall decal create the illusion that the ship is breaking through the wall.

titleCN: 可充气太阳能便携灯 & 充电器
description: 这款轻巧的产品给所有户外运动爱好者们提供了一个可以从太阳里获取能量的途径 - 充电后既可作为便携式光源，也可作为便携式充电器，从此在户外再无断电之忧
content: This inflatable solar lantern and charger is the versatile accessory that’s a must-have for your next outdoor excursion. This handy device provides a reliable light source and comes fitted with two built-in solar panels so that you can easily charge your electronic devices.

description: 有人喜欢烧火炕，有人喜欢寒玉床，这款双侧可控温度床垫可让你和你的伴侣分别为彼此设置舒适的温度，然后在冰火两重天的一张床上相拥而眠
content: With this dual temperature control mattress pad you and your significant other will be able to sleep in total comfort all night long. The pad allows you to set two different temperatures so that each person can comfortably sleep at their ideal temperature.

description: 将亚马逊这款6英寸的低音扬声器加入你已有的Alexa生态系统，除了让你的客厅看起来越发彰显高科技范儿之外，也静待100W的深低音给耳朵带来和从前完全不同的感受~
content: Improve your auditory experience at home by adding the Amazon Echo sub to your Alexa ecosystem. This 100 watt gadget features a 6″ sub that will add rich bass to your music while boasting a sleek stylish design that will look good in any part of your home.

titleEN: The Pillow For People With Glasses
description: 苦恼于晚上躺在床上追剧或阅读时眼镜在脸侧留下深深的压痕？这款特殊设计的枕头通过轮廓设计达到和戴眼镜的侧脸完美契合，非常适合睡前喜欢追剧和阅读的你~
content: The pillow for people with glasses is your ticket to relaxing in total comfort without having to remove your spectacles. Its contoured design provides support without inhibiting vision or causing uncomfortable pressure on the side of your head, face, or nose.

description: 这部遗著是霍金教授留给全人类最后的话别礼物，如果你对人类的未来感兴趣，比如想了解更多太空殖民计划或探讨上帝在宇宙中存在的可能性，那此书绝对不可不读
content: Published posthumously, “Brief Answers To Big Questions” is Stephen Hawking’s parting gift to humanity. This fascinating read tackles a series of incredibly interesting subjects such as the future of humanity, space colonization, and whether God exists.

description: 英特尔Core i7处理器，NVIDIA GeForce独立显卡，SSD硬盘，28英寸可触屏，1千3百50万真实像素，微软Surface Studio 2带来的是一场发散着创造气息的革命
content: Work more efficiently than ever by upgrading to the Mircrosoft Surface Studio 2. This brilliant piece of machinery boasts a strikingly large 28″ PixelSense display with 13.5 million pixels of true-to-life color that make this the ideal PC for the creative type.

titleCN: 哈利波特牛奶巧克力魔杖
description: 完全仿照哈利的冬青木+凤凰羽毛魔杖制作，并附带一张《初级标准咒语》练习卡，这款牛奶巧克力魔杖大概算是除了巧克力跳蛙和黄油啤酒外最受麻瓜们欢迎的零食了吧~
content: These delectable Harry Potter milk chocolate wands make the perfect gift for a sweet-toothed muggle. Each chocolaty wand is modeled after Harry’s very own wand and comes with a sheet of spells so that you can work on your wizarding skills while you snack!

description: Joe, Java, Brew, Go Juice, Rocket Fuel...不管你叫它什么，虹吸真空咖啡机只要求你注满水并将磨好的咖啡放入，然后等待崭新的一天在香味中到来~
content: Start your day off on the right note by indulging in a rich cup of your own gourmet coffee courtesy of the Syphon vacuum coffee maker. Simply fill the jug up with water, add the coffee grounds to the top chamber, and switch on the base to enjoy your brew in mere minutes.

titleCN: 一次性紧急使用汽油罐
description: 便于注入油箱的设计、对儿童安全的软管、可折叠存储的特性，这款一加仑容量的一次性汽油罐专为紧急时刻存在，让你一边酝酿讲给朋友听的故事，一边安全抵达加油站
content: Maximize your car’s limited storage space by ditching your bulky gas can for this emergency one-time use gas can. This one gallon capacity gas can comes with features like an easy pour handle and child-proof nozzle and is fully collapsible for easy storage.

description: 约翰.勃朗宁设计的.45口径半自动手枪M1911，作为美军制式手枪历经一战二战韩战越战及海湾战争，更通过反恐精英游戏被中国玩家熟知(对，就是A1)，毋庸多言，经典中的经典
content: Proclaim yourself sheriff and restore order in the work place by arming yourself with the Model 1911 rubber band gun. This handmade walnut and hard maple semi-automatic piece sports an all-wood construction and can hold and fire up to six rubber bands.

Make every Star Wars geek in the galaxy green with envy by placing these magnificent Swarovski Crystal character sculptures on display. These out-of-this-world figurines are masterfully crafted to faithfully resemble their on-screen counterparts in striking detail.

Leave all of your tough life choices up to fate by putting all your trust in the decision coin. This 1.5 inch diameter brass coin comes with “hell naw” engraved on one side and “f*ck yeah” engraved on the opposite side – so you never have to stress over another decision ever again.

Slumber more soundly than you ever thought possible by inserting these noise-masking sleepbuds from Bose in your ears before hitting the hay. Instead of music, these sleepbuds play a series of pre-loaded soothing sounds that cover up unwanted outside noise.

Live out one of Rick Sanchez’s most zany adventures by sitting down to play The Pickle Rick game. Inspired by the hilarious season 3 episode, one player takes on the role of Solenya while the other plays as Jaguar and tries to prevent The Pickle Man from escaping the compound.

Give your man cave a little bat cave inspired flair by mounting these awesome Batman bookshelves on your wall. Styled like the Caped Crusader’s iconic bat symbol, these two-piece shelves make the perfect gift for the kid or comic book fanatic in your life.

This one-piece bib and baby plate is a heaven-sent for any parent who’s forced to feed their little one on-the-go. The clever and ultra functional design serves as a lunchbox, plate, and bib so that Jr. can comfortably eat on his own without making a total mess.

Add a striking visual component to your favorite jams using this neat little pixel art Bluetooth speaker from Divoom. This small retro-designed omni-directional speaker lets you create, display, and share custom digital art while you jam out.

Give back to Mother Nature for all the paper and writing utensils you’ve consumed over the years with the sprout pencils. These eco-friendly cedar pencils contain a capsule at the end that allows you to plant the pencil after it gets down to a stump.

Impress friends and family with your sophisticated palate by preparing your food using this spherical food converter. It lets you turn almost anything into tiny edible caviar shaped pearls that look like they would cost a fortune.

Enjoy a coffee house quality cup of Joe nearly anywhere you venture to by bringing along this handcrafted instant coffee. Each little plastic vial comes with a premium roast that can instantly be prepared and enjoyed either hot or cold.

Get serious about your burgeoning breaking and entering  career by perfecting your skills using the lock pick tool kit. This professional quality tool kit provides you with everything you’ll need to get through virtually any lock that you encounter.

titleEN: The Flashlight That Runs On Any Battery
content: The flashlight that runs on any battery is the flashlight we’ve all been waiting for. The Any-Battery flashlight from Panasonic will work with either AAA, AA, C, or D batteries and can be utilized as either a flashlight or a lantern.

If this lodged bullet shot glass proves just one thing, is that alcohol and firearms are the perfect combination. Each shot glass is expertly hand-blown and fitted with a real .308 bullet lodged into the side, creating the illusion that the glass is nearly unbreakable.

With the Sous Vide precision cooker you’ll be able to whip up dishes so incredibly tender your dinner guests will think they’re dining at a 5-star restaurant. It heats up and maintains water inside the pot to a precise temperature, allowing for maximum moisture retention.

titleEN: Easy To Use Meat & Poultry Injector
content: Leave your dinner guests begging for seconds by utilizing this easy to use meat and poultry injector. It features a large handle so that you can pull and push from any angle and boasts a wide stainless steel needle that is ideal for thick sauces and marinates.

Cut down your weekly chore time by cleaning floors more efficiently than ever with the CrossWave wet-dry vacuum. This dual-purpose appliance allows you to simultaneously vacuum and wash your hardwood floors, rugs, or carpets.

This LEGO Micro Cities book is a must-have for any architect-in-training. This incredibly well illustrated and written book will show you how to construct incredibly intricate miniature cities complete with everything from bridges to towering skyscrapers.

To commemorate their 35th anniversary, Casio has released these eye-catching G-Shock skeleton gold watches. Featuring the same quality and durability you’ve come to expect from the brand, they boast a stunning gold design just as beautiful as it is rugged.

titleEN: LED Light Show Portable DJ Mixer
content: Instantly get the party started by overloading everyone’s senses with this LED light show portable DJ mixer. This all-in-one party essential provides crisp sound, stunning visuals, and comes with a built-in 6 hour rechargeable battery.

Carve up the sky and pull off amazing aerial stunts by getting your hands on this R/C flying hoverboard. It can be flown as either a paraglider or a hoverboard and boasts flight assist technology that will help you pull off some incredible tricks like a 720 degree spin.

Ensure you’re never left without power, even if you’re miles away from civilization by plugging your devices into this portable off-grid solar generator kit. It can either be charged by solar or AC power and features everything from DC to USB ports.

Spread the wealth like a true baller by showering everyone with the Make It Rain money shooter. Apart from helping you share your hard earned cash with others, this battery operated party must-have also works with coupons, business cards, playing cards, and more!

Monitoring your home’s solar energy production is as easy as checking your smartphone with this real time electricity usage monitor from Sense. It allows you to easily see how much electricity is being produced and used in your home at any given time.

Make playing with poop something the whole family can look forward to by sitting down with this Play-Doh Poop Troop playset. You and your little sculptors will be able to make fun and whimsical characters out of squishy Play-Doh turds.

Teach your children about stranger danger in the most cruel and unforgivable way possible with the creepy peeping Tom prank toy. Simply place Mr. Tom at the lowest point of your kid’s window and watch as they spend the rest of their lives forever traumatized.

Studies have shown that phones typically have 18 times more harmful bacteria than any surface in a public bathroom. This unique device charges your phone while utilizing UV lights to kill up to 99.99% of bacteria off of your phone’s surface.

Increase your productivity by creating projects and reports in record time the Scanmarker digital highlighter. Simply slide this handheld scanning pen across a line of printed text and watch it appear instantly on your computer screen!

Experience the power of the dark side of h2o with natural black water. Enriched with fulvic acid that creates a natural black color, this unusual bottled water will quench your thirst and melt your brain as you have your world turned upside down.

Learn to shred like the music gods in no time at all with the guitar learning system. This ingenious device goes over the guitar and shows you how to play the different chords with your fingers. It even includes a 60 day instructional program to help you get started.

Keep your favorite vino perfectly chilled without watering it down with ice by inserting this wine chilling stick into your bottle. This must-have accessory will keep your prized wine at the perfect drinking temperature for up to one hour.

Make the traveling process a little less taxing on your body by packing your things inside the BagoBago backpack chair. It features ample storage space along with a sturdy built-in stool that you can easily pull out any time you need a place to sit.

No self respecting beer lover’s home bar would be complete without a few of these half pint beer glasses. It can hold up to 8.4 ounces and features a long slender design that will make them a sure-fire conversation piece with all your drinking buddies.

No matter what side of the political spectrum you find yourself on, everyone will agree this Donald Trump dog costume will make your pooch great again. Your furry friend will look simply dashing in his totally natural looking blonde toupe and American flag tie.

titleEN: 1,000 Books To Read Before You Die
content: If you’re looking for your next great read, you need 1,000 Books To Read Before Your Die! It features a list that spans throughout time and different cultures to cover everything from fiction, poetry and children’s books, to biographies, travel writing, and memoirs.

Fill Halloween night with laughter instead of screams by transforming yourself into a giant Pickle Rick! This hilarious and preposterous officially licensed inflatable costume includes everything you’ll need to become the pickled version of your favorite mad scientist.

Place the finishing touch on your haunted home this Halloween by adding an eerie soundtrack using this horror movie sound effects instrument. It features a stainless iron design with a total of 30 metal sticks that surround the instrument and create horrifying sounds.

Improve your mobility and overall strength by incorporating the AlphaPro strength and conditioning tool into your workout. With the bar and resistance bands you’ll be able to perform functional exercises that will improve flexibility, stability, and coordination.

Loafing around will take on new meaning once you spend a day vegging around your home in these comfy bread slippers. These comical slippers are styled like two light and fluffy loafs of bread that look like they just came out of the oven.

These glow in the dark lingerie panties are the ideal way to top off your wild party outfit. Simply hold it to the light for a period of 3-5 minutes, and this trendy low rider thong will emit a hypnotizing blue glow that’ll keep the fun going after the lights go off.

As fun as kayaks are, they’re a down right pain to transport! But the collapsible kayak solves this problem with its ingenious design. The Oru Kayak features a unique double-wall polypropylene hull that you can fold down to the size of a suitcase for easy transport.

Keep the game going anywhere you are by upgrading to the Razer Phone 2 gaming smartphone. Specifically designed for mobile gaming, it boasts features like an ultra fast Snapdragon 845 chip set, a large 4,000 mAh battery, and a 120Hz ultramotion display.

This wind proof reverse open umbrella makes getting in and out of vehicles more convenient than ever before! The umbrella’s unique design allows you to open and close it in tighter spaces than traditional umbrellas while also being able to withstand winds in excess of 50 mph.

The Jackery Explorer 240 is the 240-watt capacity power station that will keep your campsite running without weighing you down. Coming in at under 7 lbs, it features 2 USB Outputs, an AC outlet, and a car port with surge and short circuit protection.

Keep your gums and teeth healthy without putting any toxic ingredients into your mouth by brushing with this all natural charcoal teeth whitening toothpaste. With organic ingredients like bamboo charcoal, this unique toothpaste will safely remove years of stains.

Do your part for our planet and ditch traditional plastic shampoo bottles for these vibrant shampoo bars. Designed to last up to 80 washes, each colorful bar is crafted from all-natural ingredients that will nurture your hair and leave it smelling great.

Cut the cord with your cable company once and for all and step into the future with the Roku Premiere 4K streaming device. This mighty device boasts a quad core processor, features a simple setup, and will give you access to 500,000+ movies and TV episodes.

Keep those thieving little squirrels from stealing the food you put out for the birdies with this squirrel proof bird feeder. It’s chew-proof, rustproof, waterproof, and is designed so that the weight of an adult squirrel automatically shuts the seed ports.

These quirky spaceship cat beds are the perfect place for your feline overlord to gaze over his vast domain in total comfort. Offering a spectacular view for your kitty, this small cylinder provides ample ventilation and can either be mounted onto the wall or placed on a stand.

Sock puppets are old news, if you really want to impress the kiddos these days, then this red octopus hand puppet is the way to go! This brightly colored cephalopod allows you to slip your hand under its body and use your fingers to make his tentacles wiggle.

Get your kids interested in the sciences from early on by making learning fun with the littleBits Base Inventor Kit. It will challenge your future scientists and academics to build fun and playful inventions while learning valuable STEM skills.

Amaze every Game of Thrones fan you encounter on the street by becoming the living embodiment of Tyrion Lannister with this incredible realistic mask. It’s crafted from medical-grade silicone and is entirely sculpted, painted, and decorated by hand.

Control your electronics from virtually anywhere by plugging them into the Kasa smart Wi-Fi power strip. It comes with six independently controlled smart outlets and three built-in USB ports so that you can control and monitor the electrical output of each device.

When it comes to piercing factor, the spiral blade knife stands in a class of its own. This deadly knife comes with a fiberglass reinforced nylon handle for a secure grip and features an 8 inch 2Cr13 stainless steel blade with 3 distinct cutting edges.

Coodle is the cuddling pillow that lets you sleep in a more comfortable position without having your arm fall asleep. The bridge shape of the pillow allows your partner to rest their head on top of your arm without your arm becoming trapped.

Why settle for a regular bottle opener when you can pop open your cold one using the teeth of a skull mounted on your home bar’s wall? This sinister skull is crafted from cast iron and makes the ideal addition for any home bar or man cave.

Transform your cute pet into an adorable arachnid by getting them into the Halloween spirit with this pet spider costume. Designed for small pets weighing up to 15 pounds, this wacky getup features eight furry legs that you can position any way that you want.

titleEN: Jurassic World Trainable Robotic Pet Blue
content: Fulfill your career goals by becoming a real life raptor trainer with this Jurassic World trainable robot. Modeled after fan-favorite raptor Blue, it comes with its very own remote control that is styled just like Owen’s clicker so that you can easily control your clever girl.
